title: Peter Odhiambo (boxer, born 1927)
text: Peter Odhiambo (born 14 October 1927) was a Kenyan-born Ugandan <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201960%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Middleweight">men's middleweight</a> event at the <a href="1960%20Summer%20Olympics">1960 Summer Olympics</a> and the men's 75 kg event at the <a href="1962%20British%20Empire%20and%20Commonwealth%20Games">1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games</a>. At the 1960 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Eddie%20Crook%20Jr.">Eddie Crook Jr.</a> of the United States.
